栯字的基本解释

栯
yǒu
古书上说的一种树：“（泰室之山）其上有木焉，叶状如梨而赤理，其名曰栯木，服者不妒。”

栯
yù
〔栯李〕现在写作“郁李”。落叶小灌木，春季开花，淡红色，可供观赏。果实小而圆，暗红色，可以吃。种子叫郁李仁，可以入药。

栯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǒu］
［《廣韻》云久切，上有，云。］
木名。
[②]［yù］
［《廣韻》於六切，入屋，影。］
果木名。参见“栯2李”。

栯字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　栯； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页523第17
【唐韻】於六切【集韻】【類篇】乙六切，?音郁。【廣韻】栯李也。【唐本草】栯李一名雀李，一名車下李，一名棣子。小如櫻桃，五月熟。【詩詁】卽赤棣。　又【唐韻】禹九切【類篇】云九切，?音有。【山海經】太室之山有木，狀如梨而赤理，名曰栯，服之不妒。　又【集韻】尤救切，音宥。義同。

栯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
栯字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树，其种子可以用药。

栯
Basic explanation of words
栯
yǒu
A kind of tree said in ancient books: "(Mountain in the Thai room) There is wood on it, the leaves are like pears with red leaves, and its name is tanwood, and those who take it are not jealous."
栯
yù
〔栯李〕Now written as "Yu Li". Small deciduous shrubs, blooming in spring, light red, for viewing. The fruit is small, round, dark red, and can be eaten. The seed is called Yu Liren and can be used as medicine.
栯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǒu］
["Guangyun" the cloud cuts for a long time, there is, the cloud. ]
Wooden name.
[②]［yù］
["Guangyun" in six cuts, entering the house, filming. ]
Fruit tree name. See "栯2 Li".
栯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　栯; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 523 Page 17
【Tang Yun】Yu Liuqie 【Jiyun】【Class Chapter】B Liuqie, sound is gloomy. [Guang Yun] Li Ye. [Tang Materia Medica] There is one bird plum, one under the car, and one dizi. Small as cherries, ripe in May. 【Poetry 诂】卽赤棣.　[Tang Yun] Yu Jiuqi [Classes] Yun Jiuqi,? The sound is there. [Shanhaijing] The mountains in the Taishi have woods, which are like pears and red, and their name is 栯, and they are not jealous.　[Jiyun] You Jiuqie, Yinyou. The same meaning.
